tool_description: An API showing the latest Metaverse news around the globe.
name: Metaverse Outlet
title: Metaverse Outlet

api_list.name: Get All Metaverse News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news related to the metaverse.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metaverse-outlet.p.rapidapi.com/metaverse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metaverse-outlet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://metaverse-outlet.p.rapidapi.com/metaverse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metaverse-outlet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
